areaPlaceHolder.message: Key in host names here (ex. kknews.cc)

errorHostNames.message: Invalid host names. Nothing is changed.

oneAdded.message: "$HOST$" has been added into the farm list.

onlyOneAdded.message: Only "$HOST$" was added into the farm list.

allAdded.message: All items ($COUNT$) have been added into the farm list.

onlySomeAdded.message: Only $COUNT$ items were added into the farm list.

oneRemoved.message: "$HOST$" has been removed from the farm list.

onlyOneRemoved.message: Only 1 item was removed from the farm list.

allRemoved.message: All items ($COUNT$) have been removed from the farm list.

onlySomeRemoved.message: Only $COUNT$ items were removed from the farm list.
